com.aliyun.oss

类 ClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aliyun.oss.ClientConfiguration
  • 直接已知子类:
    ClientBuilderConfiguration

    public class ClientConfiguration
extends Object
    Client configurations for accessing to OSS services.

      List<String> getCnameExcludeList()
      Gets the immutable excluded CName list----any domain ends with an item in this list will not do Cname resolution.

      Gets the timeout in millisecond for retrieving an available connection from the connection manager. 0 means infinite and -1 means not defined.

      Gets the socket connection timeout in millisecond.

      • isSupportCname

        public boolean isSupportCname()
        Gets the flag if supporting Cname in the endpoint. By default it's true.
        返回:
        True if supporting Cname; False if not.

      • setSupportCname

        public ClientConfiguration setSupportCname(boolean supportCname)
        Sets the flag if supporting Cname in the endpoint. By default it's true.

        If this value is set true, when building a canonical url, the host would be checked against the Cname excluded list. If that host is found in the list, then it's treated as non-CName and accessed as TLD (third level domain). If the host is found, then it's thought as CName. If this value is set false, then always uses TLD to access the endpoint.

        参数:
        supportCname - The flag if supporting CName.

      • isSLDEnabled

        public boolean isSLDEnabled()
        Gets the flag of using SLD (Second Level Domain) style to access the endpoint. By default it's false. When using SLD, then the bucket endpoint would be: http://host/bucket. Otherwise, it will be http://bucket.host
        返回:
        True if it's enabled; False if it's disabled.

      • setSLDEnabled

        public ClientConfiguration setSLDEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the flag of using SLD (Second Level Domain) style to access the endpoint. By default it's false.
        参数:
        enabled - True if it's enabled; False if it's disabled.

      • getValidateAfterInactivity

        public int getValidateAfterInactivity()
        The connection idle time threshold in millisecond that triggers the validation. By default it's 2000.
        返回:
        The connection idle time threshold.

      • isRequestTimeoutEnabled

        public boolean isRequestTimeoutEnabled()
        Gets the flag of enabling request timeout. By default it's disabled.
        返回:
        true enabled; false disabled.

      • setRequestTimeoutEnabled

        public void setRequestTimeoutEnabled(boolean requestTimeoutEnabled)
        Gets the flag of enabling request timeout. By default it's disabled.
        参数:
        requestTimeoutEnabled - true to enable; false to disable.

      • setRequestTimeout

        public void setRequestTimeout(int requestTimeout)
        Sets the timeout value in millisecond. By default it's 5 min.

      • getRequestTimeout

        public int getRequestTimeout()
        Gets the timeout value in millisecond.

      • getSlowRequestsThreshold

        public long getSlowRequestsThreshold()
        Sets the slow request's latency threshold. If a request's latency is more than it, the request will be logged. By default the threshold is 5 min.

      • setSlowRequestsThreshold

        public void setSlowRequestsThreshold(long slowRequestsThreshold)
        Gets the slow request's latency threshold. If a request's latency is more than it, the request will be logged.

      • getDefaultHeaders

        public Map<String,String> getDefaultHeaders()
        Gets the default http headers. All these headers would be automatically added in every request. And if a header is also specified in the request, the default one will be overwritten.

      • setDefaultHeaders

        public void setDefaultHeaders(Map<String,String> defaultHeaders)
        Sets the default http headers. All these headers would be automatically added in every request. And if a header is also specified in the request, the default one will be overwritten.
        参数:
        defaultHeaders - Default http headers.

        参数:

        value - The default header value.

      • isCrcCheckEnabled

        public boolean isCrcCheckEnabled()
        Gets the flag of enabling CRC checksum on upload and download. By default it's true.
        返回:
        true enable CRC;false disable CRC.

      • setCrcCheckEnabled

        public void setCrcCheckEnabled(boolean crcCheckEnabled)
        Sets the flag of enabling CRC checksum on upload and download. By default it's true.
        参数:
        crcCheckEnabled - True to enable CRC; False to disable CRC.

        Sets signature version for all request.
        参数:
        signatureVersion -

      • getTickOffset

        public long getTickOffset()
        Gets the difference between customized epoch time and local time, in millisecond.
        返回:
        tick Offset

      • setTickOffset

        public void setTickOffset(long epochTicks)
        Sets the custom base time. OSS's token validation logic depends on the time. It requires that there's no more than 15 min time difference between client and OSS server. This API calculates the difference between local time to epoch time. Later one other APIs use this difference to offset the local time before sending request to OSS.
        参数:
        epochTicks - Custom Epoch ticks (in millisecond).

      • getRetryStrategy

        public RetryStrategy getRetryStrategy()
        Gets the retry strategy
        返回:
        RetryStrategy object.

      • setRetryStrategy

        public void setRetryStrategy(RetryStrategy retryStrategy)
        Sets the retry strategy.
        参数:
        retryStrategy - The retryStrategy is used to check whether to retry request or not. If it has been specified, the client will prefer this retryStrategy to its private strategy, you can check the SDK private class com.aliyun.oss.common.comm.DefaultServiceClient#DefaultRetryStrategy to see the service client's private default strategy.

        返回:
        the flag of http redirection.

        public void setRedirectEnable(boolean redirectEnable)
        Sets the flag of http redirection.
        参数:
        redirectEnable - Determines whether redirects should be handled automatically.

      • isVerifySSLEnable

        返回:

        参数:

      • setX509TrustManagers

        public void setX509TrustManagers(X509TrustManager[] x509TrustManagers)
        Sets the instance of this interface manage which X509 certificates may be used to authenticate the remote side of a secure socket.
        参数:
        x509TrustManagers - x509 trust managers

      • getSecureRandom

        public SecureRandom getSecureRandom()
        Gets the cryptographically strong random number.
        返回:
        random number.

      • setSecureRandom

        public void setSecureRandom(SecureRandom secureRandom)
        Sets the cryptographically strong random number.
        参数:
        secureRandom - the cryptographically strong random number

      • getHostnameVerifier

        public HostnameVerifier getHostnameVerifier()
        Gets the instance of this interface for hostname verification.
        返回:
        the hostname verification instance.

      • setHostnameVerifier

        public void setHostnameVerifier(HostnameVerifier hostnameVerifier)
        Sets instance of this interface for hostname verification.
        参数:
        hostnameVerifier - the hostname verification instance

      • setLogConnectionPoolStats

        public void setLogConnectionPoolStats(boolean enabled)
        Sets the flag of logging connection pool statistics.
        参数:
        enabled - True if it's enabled; False if it's disabled.

      • isLogConnectionPoolStatsEnable

        public boolean isLogConnectionPoolStatsEnable()
        Gets the flag of logging connection pool statistics. By default it's disabled.
        返回:
        true enabled; false disabled.

      • setUseSystemPropertyValues

        public void setUseSystemPropertyValues(boolean enabled)
        Sets the flag of using system property values if any of the config options are missing. The properties currently supported are http.proxyHost, http.proxyPort, http.proxyUser and http.proxyPassword.
        参数:
        enabled - True if it's enabled; False if it's disabled.

      • isUseSystemPropertyValues

        public boolean isUseSystemPropertyValues()
        Gets the flag of using system property values. By default it's disabled.
        返回:
        true enabled; false disabled.
